  • Method Details

    • addEmployee

      public void addEmployee()
      Adds a new employee to the system by collecting necessary details from the user. Validates input data and throws InvalidInputException if validation fails. Upon successful validation, creates a new Employee object and adds it to the database.
      Specified by:
      addEmployee in interface IEmployeeService

    • getEmployeeById

      public void getEmployeeById(int employeeId) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves and displays the details of an employee based on the provided employee ID.
      Specified by:
      getEmployeeById in interface IEmployeeService
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to retrieve.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.
      EmployeeNotFoundException - If the employee with the given ID is not found.

    • getAllEmployees

      public void getAllEmployees() throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves and displays details of all employees in the system.
      Specified by:
      getAllEmployees in interface IEmployeeService
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

    • updateEmployee

      public void updateEmployee(int employeeId) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Updates the details of an existing employee based on the provided employee ID. Prompts the user for updated information, validates it, and then updates the employee record.
      Specified by:
      updateEmployee in interface IEmployeeService
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to update.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.
      EmployeeNotFoundException - If the employee with the given ID is not found.

    • removeEmployee

      public void removeEmployee(int employeeId) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Removes an employee from the system based on the provided employee ID.
      Specified by:
      removeEmployee in interface IEmployeeService
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to remove.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.
      EmployeeNotFoundException - If the employee with the given ID is not found.
